hero.title: Instant AI Image Scanner
hero.subtitle: Photo Verification
hero.description: Tired of images generated by artificial intelligence? Our powerful AI image scanner instantly analyzes and verifies whether photos are real or AI-generated with 98% accuracy.

features.title: Advanced AI Image Detection Features
features.subtitle: Stay Ahead of Deepfakes with the Latest Technology

detailed.title: State-of-the-Art Detection Algorithm
detailed.description: Our proprietary AI technology can identify even the most sophisticated AI-generated images. Simply upload any photo and get instant verification results that highlight artificial elements.

detailed.title: Comprehensive Analysis Reports
detailed.description: Receive detailed reports showing confidence scores, detected manipulation markers, and authenticity verification. Perfect for professionals needing documented evidence of image authenticity.

usecases.title: Use Cases
usecases.subtitle: Real-world applications of AI Image Scanner

items.title: Journalism
items.desc: Instantly check the authenticity of images used in news to prevent the spread of misinformation.

items.title: Social Media
items.desc: Increase brand trust by verifying the authenticity of shared photos.

items.title: E-Commerce
items.desc: Ensure customer confidence by verifying the originality of product images.

items.title: Education
items.desc: Use in visual analysis training to help students gain digital literacy.

benchmark.title: The leading solution according to external benchmarks.
benchmark.accuracyTitle: The highest accuracy for AI-generated media detection
benchmark.accuracySource: Source: Study by the University of Rochester and the University of Kansas
benchmark.accuracyDesc: This external research study employed 80,000 images, encompassing both real images and images synthesized by various text-to-image generators. These images were new and thus unknown to the study participants. The research paper is available here.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Professionals Worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: See what verified users say about our AI image detection technology

cta.title: Don't Be Fooled by AI Images!
cta.desc: Join thousands of professionals who trust our AI image detector to verify photo authenticity. Limited time offer: Get 50 free scans when you sign up today.

footer.desc: A reliable tool for detecting whether images are generated by artificial intelligence.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Our AI image detection process is simple, fast, and highly accurate

steps.title: Upload Your Image
steps.description: Simply upload any image you want to analyze. Our system accepts JPG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 10MB.

steps.title: AI Analysis
steps.description: Our advanced AI algorithms analyze the image for patterns, inconsistencies, and markers that indicate AI generation.

steps.title: Get Results
steps.description: Receive detailed results showing whether the image is AI-generated or authentic, with confidence scores and analysis.
